body_html:
Hi :)

would it be possible to test pytorch compilation for GCC 7? .travis.yml uses Trusty as Ubuntu Distribution and - according to the Travis CI documentation - GCC 7 is available using g++-7 on Trusty. For more information see here :)
body_text:
Hi :)
would it be possible to test pytorch compilation for GCC 7? .travis.yml uses Trusty as Ubuntu Distribution and - according to the Travis CI documentation - GCC 7 is available using g++-7 on Trusty. For more information see here :)
body:
Hi :)

would it be possible to test `pytorch` compilation for GCC 7? `.travis.yml` uses *Trusty* as Ubuntu Distribution and - according to the *Travis CI* documentation - GCC 7 is available using `g++-7` on *Trusty*. For more information see [here](https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/languages/cpp/#GCC-on-Linux) :)
